title: text-decoration-line
description: The `text-decoration-line` CSS property sets the type of line decoration applied to text, such as 'underline', 'overline' or 'line-through'.
content: The property that defines what type of line decoration will be applied to text, such as 'underline', 'overline' or 'line-through'. It allows for combining multiple lines, such as underlining and striking through, to create different text decoration effects.
